TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit KeyPressEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks A指定當使用者按下的按鍵由所組成的字元。A specifies the character that is composed when the user presses a key. 例如，當使用者按下 SHIFT + K、屬性會傳回大寫的 k。For example, when the user presses SHIFT + K, the property returns an uppercase K. A事件發生於使用者按下按鍵時。A event occurs when the user presses a key. 密切相關的兩個事件事件和。Two events that are closely related to the event are and . 事件位於每個時使用者按下按鍵，事件和事件發生於使用者鬆開按鍵時。The event precedes each event when the user presses a key, and a event occurs when the user releases a key. 當使用者按住按鍵時，重複和事件發生的每個字元重複的時間。When the user holds down a key, duplicate and events occur each time the character repeats. 一個版本時，就會產生事件。One event is generated upon release. 與每個事件，傳遞。With each event, a is passed. A傳遞與每個和事件。A is passed with each and event. A指定任何輔助按鍵 （CTRL、 shift 鍵或 ALT） 已按下以及另一個索引鍵。A specifies whether any modifier keys (CTRL, SHIFT, or ALT) were pressed along with another key. (您也可以透過取得此修飾詞資訊屬性類別。)(This modifier information can also be obtained through the property of the class.) 設定至`true`取消`KeyPress`事件。Set to `true` to cancel the `KeyPress` event. 這可防止控制項處理按鍵。This keeps the control from processing the key press. > [!NOTE] > 有些控制項將會在處理某些按鍵。Some controls will process certain key strokes on . 例如，處理 Enter 鍵，然後再呼叫。For example, processes the Enter key before is called. 在這種情況下，您無法取消事件，且必須取消從按鍵改為。In such cases, you cannot cancel the event, and must cancel the key stroke from instead. 事件模型的相關資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For information about the event model, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例說明如何使用計算索引鍵，使用者按下並顯示結果之後每個按鍵。The following example illustrates using the to count keys as they are pressed and to display the results after each key press. 然後設為 true 會保持作業系統從進一步處理索引鍵。 is then set to true to keep the operating system from further processing the key. 這個範例假設的表單具有置於其上。The example assumes a form with a placed on it. [!code-cpp[Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 您必須建立這個類別的新執行個體。You must create a new instance of this class. 您也必須設定事件處理常式。You must also set the event handler. 您可以在建構函式中為您的類別。You can do this in the constructor for your class. [!code-cpp[Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example/VB/source2.vb#2)] 當控制項中引發指定的事件時，呼叫附加的方法時，應用程式可執行程式碼，以回應事件。When the specified event is raised in the control, the attached method is called and the application can execute code in response to the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(char keyChar) cil managed

param.name: keyChar
param.span: 對應使用者所按下按鍵的 ASCII 字元。

span.span: The ASCII character corresponding to the key the user pressed.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來取得輔助按鍵的目前狀態。Use the property to get the current state of the modifier keys. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示訊息方塊顯示 SHIFT 鍵的目前狀態。The following example displays a message box that shows the current state of the SHIFT key.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Handled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定數值，表示是否處理 事件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the event was handled.

value.span: 如果事件已處理則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the event is handled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未處理的事件，它會傳送至作業系統的預設處理中。If the event is not handled, it will be sent to the operating system for default processing. 設定至`true`取消`KeyPress`事件。Set to `true` to cancel the `KeyPress` event. ## Examples 下列範例會建立控制項。The following example creates a control. `keypressed`方法會使用屬性來檢查是否已按下 ENTER 鍵。The `keypressed` method uses the property to check whether the ENTER key is pressed. 按下 ENTER 鍵時，如果屬性設定為`true`，表示事件處理。If the ENTER key is pressed, the property is set to `true`, which indicates the event is handled. [!code-cpp[KeyPressEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyPressEventArgs/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[KeyPressEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyPressEventArgs/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyPressEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyPressEventArgs/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property char KeyChar { char get(); void set(char value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定對應於所按下按鍵的字元。

span.span: Gets or sets the character corresponding to the key pressed.
The ASCII character that is composed.

value.span: 例如，如果使用者按下 SHIFT + K，這個屬性就傳回大寫的 K。

span.span: For example, if the user presses SHIFT + K, this property returns an uppercase K.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用範例按鍵在執行階段，並修改特殊執行階段的情況下的按鍵輸入的屬性。Use the property to sample keystrokes at run time and to modify keystrokes under special run-time circumstances. 例如，您可以使用要停用非數字的按鍵，當使用者輸入郵遞區號時，變更為大寫資料欄位中的項目，所有依字母順序排列的按鍵或監視鍵盤或其他金鑰的輸入的裝置特定的索引鍵組合。For example, you can use to disable non-numeric keypresses when the user enters a ZIP code, change all alphabetical keypresses to uppercase in a data entry field, or monitor the keyboard or other key input device for specific key combinations. 您可以取得或設定下列機碼：You can get or set the following keys: - a 到 z、 A 到 Z。a-z, A-Z. - CTRL 鍵。CTRL. - 標點符號。Punctuation marks. - 數字鍵，同時在頂端的鍵盤和數字鍵台上。Number keys, both across the top of the keyboard and on the numeric keypad. - 輸入。ENTER. 您無法取得或設定下列機碼：You cannot get or set the following keys: - TAB 鍵。The TAB key. - 插入和刪除。INSERT and DELETE. - 首頁。HOME. - 結束。END. - PAGE UP 和 PAGE down 鍵。PAGE UP and PAGE DOWN. - F1-F2.F1-F2. - ALT 鍵。ALT. - 方向鍵Arrow keys. > [!NOTE] > 如需如何偵測任何非字元按鍵上述資訊，請參閱類別。For information about how to detect any of the non-character keys mentioned above, see the class. - ## Examples 下列範例會建立控制項。The following example creates a control. `keypressed`方法會使用屬性來檢查是否按下 ENTER 鍵。The `keypressed` method uses the property to check whether the ENTER key pressed. 按下 ENTER 鍵時，如果屬性設定為`true`，表示事件處理。If the ENTER key is pressed, the property is set to `true`, which indicates the event is handled. [!code-cpp[KeyPressEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyPressEventArgs/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[KeyPressEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyPressEventArgs/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyPressEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyPressEventArgs/VB/form1.vb#1)]
